tool_description: IP Geolocation API allows developers to get geolocation information for a given IP address. Data points returned by this GeoIP API include city, state, province, country, continent, latitude, longitude, region, timezone, current time, organization, ISP, local currency, and country flags. This IP Location API can be used for content personalization, geotargeting, geofencing, ad targeting, digital rights management, form auto-completion, etc. With the free plan, you can make 15,000 IP lookup AP...
name: IP Geolocation by ipgeolocation.io
title: IP Geolocation by ipgeolocation.io

api_list.name: Get Client IP
api_list.description: Get the IP Address of the Client
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ejaz1-ip-geolocation-v1.p.rapidapi.com/getip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ejaz1-ip-geolocation-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ejaz1-ip-geolocation-v1.p.rapidapi.com/getip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ejaz1-ip-geolocation-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get IP Geolocation
api_list.description: This endpoint returns geolocation and other useful points from an IP Address. If IP address is provided as query parameter, geolocation is performed on that IP address. If IP address is left empty, geolocation data of client IP is returned.

optional_parameters.name: ip
optional_parameters.description: Provide the IP address to geolocate. If set blank, API will use client IP.

optional_parameters.name: excludes
optional_parameters.description: You can also filter the API response by specifying the name of fields/objects that you want to remove from the API response.  This is also comma separated.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Specify the fields to retrieve in response. Field names can be comma separated. Possible values are city, currency, geo and everything which appears in json response. To speed up the response time, its better to provide the fields which are needed rather than pulling everything.
